text: Algeciras railway station is the southernmost rail station on the Spanish rail network, and serves the town of Algeciras, Andalusia. ==Information== Algeciras station is located at the end of the Algeciras-Bobadilla railway. It is served by Renfe Media Distancia and Altaria train services to Granada, Córdoba and Madrid. The line is being upgraded by Adif at a cost of €13.5 million.https://m.europasur.es/algeciras/renfe-13-millones-trenes- madrid_0_1363664069.html == Services == ==References== Category:Railway stations in Andalusia
title: Algeciras railway station
